entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
